DOC.detailed_description: The study prospective , single center clinical trial establish efficacy NuCel , minimally manipulate allograft tissue , use lumbar interbody intertransverse fusion procedure . Subjects undergo standard interbody fusion surgery per sign informed consent NuCel autograft bone . Patients evaluate postoperatively 6 week , 3 month , 6 month , 1 year , 2 year ( require ) .
